text: Ten ni ari-chi ni aru, subete no mono wa arra no yudearu. Anata gata jishin no naka ni aru mono o, gen wa shite mo mata kakushite mo, arra wa soreto anata gata o seisan shite ora reru. Arra wa, oboshimeshi no mono o yurushi, mata oboshimeshi no mono o bassa reru. Arra wa subete no koto ni zen'no de ara reru
